ValidationRule.description: Fields must be filled in to close: Closure disposition, Resolution date, Case Closed date, Purge date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName="RCI" && Closed__c=TRUE && ISPICKVAL(Closure_Disposition__c,"") && ISBLANK(Resolution_Date__c) && ISBLANK(Case_Closed_Date__c) && ISBLANK(Purge_Date__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the following fields to close a case: Closure Disposition, Case Closed Date, Purge Date, Resolution Date
